channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：在西藏人纪念反抗中国统治的起义后流亡国外65周年之际，散居各地的民选领导人称中国政府正在压迫西藏人民，但他坚持认为解决问题的希望依然存在。
item.description: VIDEO: As Tibetans mark 65 years since fleeing into exile after an uprising against Chinese rule, the diaspora's elected leader says Beijing is crushing his people, but insists that hope of resolution remains.

item.title: 视频：人造宝石正在重塑价值 890 亿美元的全球钻石珠宝市场，尤其是在印度西部城市苏拉特，全球 90% 的钻石都是在这里切割和抛光的。
item.description: VIDEO: Man-made gems are reshaping the $89 billion global diamond jewellery market, especially in the west Indian city of Surat where 90 percent of the world's diamonds are cut and polished.

item.title: 波兰警方周三表示，他们正在调查农民抗议活动中的一条横幅，该横幅呼吁俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京让乌克兰 "秩序井然"，这在基辅引发了愤怒。
item.description:
Polish police said Wednesday they were investigating a banner at a farmers' protest calling on the Russian President Vladimir Putin to get Ukraine "in order", which sparked anger in Kyiv.
u.afp.com/5Na9

item.title: 视频：每隔两个月，米开朗基罗 1504 年完成的《大卫》雕像就会在佛罗伦萨阿卡德米亚美术馆的家中接受一次仔细的清洗，这尊雕像在这里已经居住了 150 多年。
item.description: VIDEO: Every two months, Michelangelo's statue of David, completed in 1504, undergoes a careful cleaning at its home in Florence's Accademia Gallery, where it has resided for over 150 years.

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 拜仁慕尼黑周三表示，他们将在本赛季结束后与主帅托马斯-图赫尔分道扬镳，因为这支德国卫冕冠军在德甲联赛冠军争夺战中举步维艰。
item.description:
#UPDATE Bayern Munich said Wednesday they would part ways with manager Thomas Tuchel at the end of the season, as the reigning German champions struggled to stay in the Bundesliga title race.
u.afp.com/5Naj

item.title: 视频：希腊约 130 辆拖拉机和数十辆皮卡车停在希腊雅典广场的议会外，要求财政援助，政府警告称已无更多资金可提供，从而使为期四周的摊牌升级。
item.description: VIDEO: Around 130 tractors and dozens of pickup trucks are parked outside parliament on Syntagma Square in Athens, Greece, demanding financial aid, escalating a four-week showdown as the government warns it has no more funds to give.

item.title: R to @AFP："我迫不及待地想要获得自由"：法国妇女踏上前往比利时安乐死的最后旅程。[2/2] 点击此处阅读完整报道：
item.description:
"I can't wait to be free": French woman takes final journey to Belgium for euthanasia. [2/2]
Read the full report here: u.afp.com/5Naa

item.title: [聚焦]记者应如何报道安乐死？两名 @AFP 记者跟踪报道了法国妇女莉迪-伊姆霍夫（Lydie Imhoff）将近一年的时间，在她开始失去四肢功能后，她不想 "活在一具死尸里"，然后在比利时捕捉到了她的最后时刻。[1/2] ➡️
item.description:
[SPOTLIGHT] How should journalists report on euthanasia? Two @AFP journalists followed Lydie Imhoff, a French woman who didn't want to "live in a dead body" after she began to lose the use of her limbs, for almost a year before capturing her last moments in Belgium. [1/2]
➡️ u.afp.com/5Nag

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：欧盟轮值主席国比利时表示，在莫斯科入侵乌克兰两周年前夕，欧盟已同意对俄罗斯实施第 13 轮制裁。
item.description: #UPDATE The EU has agreed a 13th round of sanctions on Russia on the eve of the second anniversary of Moscow's invasion of Ukraine, said Belgium, which holds the bloc's presidency.

item.title: #俱乐部：图赫尔将在本赛季结束后离开拜仁
item.description: #BREAKING Tuchel to leave Bayern at the end of the season: club

item.title: R to @AFP：视频：经过近 24 个月的战争，乌克兰军队寡不敌众，俄军再次发动进攻。 在俄罗斯 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰两周年纪念日即将到来之际，让我们来看看战争在当地的发展情况。
item.description:
VIDEO: After nearly 24 months of war, Ukraine’s troops are outnumbered and outgunned and Russian forces are once again on the offensive.
Here’s a look at how the war is developing on the ground as the two-year anniversary of Russia’s February 2022 invasion approaches.

item.title: #欧盟同意就乌克兰战争对俄罗斯实施新制裁
item.description: #BREAKING EU agrees fresh sanctions on Russia over Ukraine war

item.title: 视频：俄罗斯攻占阿夫迪夫卡后，附近塞利多夫（Selydove）的居民正在猜测他们是否会成为下一个目标。地区警察发言人奥列克桑德拉-加夫列尔科（Oleksandra Gavrylko）说："一些人正在趁机撤离，但 "更多的时候，我们撤离的是死亡的平民"。
item.description: VIDEO: Following Russia's capture of Avdiivka, people in nearby Selydove are wondering if they will be next. Some are getting out while they can but "more often than not, we evacuate dead civilians," says Oleksandra Gavrylko, spokeswoman for the regional police.

item.title:
本周三，在二战中为抵抗纳粹占领法国而牺牲的无国籍亚美尼亚诗人米萨克-马努奇安（Missak Manouchian）成为第一位进入先贤祠民族英雄陵墓的非法国抵抗运动战士。
这一迟来的荣誉被视为对参加法国抵抗运动的外国人英勇事迹的早该承认。
item.description:
A stateless Armenian poet - Missak Manouchian - who died fighting the Nazi occupation of France in WWII on Wednesday becomes the first non-French Resistance fighter to enter the Pantheon mausoleum for national heroes.

The belated honour has been seen as long overdue recognition of the bravery of foreigners who fought with the French Resistance

u.afp.com/5NEQ

item.title:
数千名抗议的印度农民将于周三继续向新德里进发。
农民们未能就提高农作物价格的要求与政府达成协议。
item.description:
Thousands of protesting Indian farmers are to resume their push towards New Delhi on Wednesday.

The farmers have failed to reach a deal with the government on their demands for higher crop prices

u.afp.com/5NbV

item.title:
你无法想象损失有多大。
从老挝古代王都琅勃拉邦乘船逆流而上，不远处正在修建一座巨型水坝，批评者认为这将威胁到这座河畔小镇的魅力和遗产地位。
item.description:
'You can't imagine the damage.'

A short boat ride upstream from the ancient Laotian royal capital of Luang Prabang, a massive dam is under construction that critics say threatens the riverside town's allure and heritage status

u.afp.com/5NEN

item.title:
牲畜保险为索马里带来了希望。
这个非洲之角的国家刚刚开始摆脱四十年来最严重的干旱。一个新项目旨在通过在牧民因气候灾害损失牲畜时提供赔付来保护社区。
item.description:
Livestock insurance offers hope in Somalia.

The Horn of Africa nation is only just beginning to emerge from the worst drought in four decades. A new project aims to protect the community by offering payouts when herders lose animals to climate disasters

u.afp.com/5NEp

item.title:
"我们正在慢慢死去"
在藏人准备纪念反对中国统治的起义失败65周年、达赖喇嘛的继任者问题迫在眉睫之际，流亡政治领袖奔巴次仁称，北京正在压迫他的人民。
item.description:
"We are dying a slow death."

As Tibetans prepare to mark 65 years since a failed uprising against Chinese rule and questions loom over the Dalai Lama's successor, exiled political leader Penpa Tsering says Beijing is crushing his people

u.afp.com/5Nb2

item.title:
R to @AFP：在美国否决联合国停火决议后，以色列继续对饱受战争蹂躏的加沙进行致命轰炸。
联合国粮食及农业组织表示，在面临 "完全的混乱和暴力 "之后，它不得不停止向加沙北部运送急需的物资。
item.description:
Israel's deadly bombardment of war-torn Gaza continues after US vetoes UN ceasefire resolution.

UN's food agency says it has to stop desperately-needed deliveries to the north of Gaza after facing "complete chaos and violence"

u.afp.com/5Nbz

item.title:
R to @AFP：乌克兰战争造成的死亡人数仍不清楚。
俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年后，造成了数十万人的伤亡，但确切的死亡人数仍不得而知，双方都对自己的损失遮遮掩掩，俄罗斯则掩盖了平民的死亡。
item.description:
Death toll from Ukraine war still unknown.

Two years after the Russian invasion, the human cost is in the hundreds of thousands, but the exact toll is unknown, with both sides shrouding their losses in secrecy, and Russia covering up civilian deaths

u.afp.com/5Nbb

item.title:
视频： 米开朗基罗的《大卫》在佛罗伦萨享受水疗。
每隔两个月，米开朗基罗 1504 年完成的《大卫》雕像都要在佛罗伦萨的阿卡德米亚美术馆（Accademia Gallery）进行一次仔细的清洗。他的私人修复师埃莱奥诺拉-普奇（Eleonora Pucci）爬上脚手架近距离观看，这是为保护这座文艺复兴时期的圣像所必须进行的监测和清洁工作的一部分，去年有超过 200 万游客参观了这座圣像。
item.description:
VIDEO: Michelangelo's David gets spa treatment in Florence.

Every two months, Michelangelo's statue of David, completed in 1504, undergoes a careful cleaning at its home in Florence's Accademia Gallery, where it has resided for over 150 years. His personal restorer, Eleonora Pucci, climbs on a scaffolding for an up-close view -- part of a monitoring and cleaning ritual necessary for the preservation of the Renaissance icon visited by over two million visitors last year

item.title:
"这是纳瓦尔尼的一种形式"
特朗普周二将自己的法律麻烦与上周死于狱中的俄罗斯反对派人士阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼受到的迫害相提并论。 他没有提到普京
item.description:
"It's a form of Navalny."

Trump on Tuesday compared his own legal troubles with the persecution of Russian opposition figure Alexei Navalny, who died in prison last week. He did not mention Putin

u.afp.com/5NLr

Homeward bound.

@AFP's Jorge Guerrero photographs the release of Iberian lynxes in the Sierra de Arana mountain range in Iznalloz, Spain.

Five Iberian lynxes, one female, named Unica and four males named Urki, Uivo, Ursin and Ukendo, were released on February 20, 2024 in a mountainous area of the Andalusian province of Granada, as part of the "LIFE Lynx Connect" project to repopulate this native species from the Iberian Peninsula in the ecosystems most adapted to its characteristics

item.title:
缺雨让意大利喘不过气来。
周二，米兰和伦巴第大区的其他八个城市禁止汽车上路，因为意大利各地缺雨加剧了污染并引发了干旱。
item.description:
Lack of rain leaves Italy gasping.

Cars were banned from roads on Tuesday in Milan and eight other cities across Lombardy as a lack of rain across Italy exacerbates pollution and sparks droughts

u.afp.com/5NLB

item.title: 美国检察官在期待已久的审判结案陈词中告诉陪审员，涉嫌谋杀杰姆-杰伊（Jam Master Jay）的凶手是刽子手，他们伏击 Run-DMC 成员是毒品纠纷的一部分
item.description: The alleged murderers of Jam Master Jay were executioners who ambushed the Run-DMC member as part of a drug dispute, US prosecutors told jurors during closing arguments of the long-awaited trial u.afp.com/5NLn

item.title: 在本月举行的选举未能产生决定性获胜者之后，巴基斯坦的两个王朝政党宣布了一项权力分享协议，谢巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）将重返总理宝座。
item.description: Pakistan's two dynastic parties announced a power-sharing agreement that is set to return Shehbaz Sharif to the premiership after an election this month failed to produce a decisive winner u.afp.com/5NLs

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 欧盟称已就反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在狱中死亡一事召见俄罗斯驻布鲁塞尔代办
item.description: #UPDATE The European Union said that it had summoned the Russian charge d'affaires in Brussels over the death in prison of opposition leader Alexei Navalny u.afp.com/5NLP

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：莫斯科一家法院称，被监禁的美国记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）将至少被审前拘留至 3 月 30 日，因为他的一名双重国籍公民被单独逮捕。
同时，俄罗斯禁止了美国资助的自由欧洲电台/自由电台
item.description:
#UPDATE A Moscow court said jailed US journalist Evan Gershkovich would remain in pre-trial detention until at least March 30, as a dual citizen was separately arrested.

Meanwhile Russia banned US-funded Radio Free Europe/ Radio Liberty u.afp.com/5NLd

item.title: 根据法新社看到的法庭文件，一名海地法官起诉了数十人，指控他们参与了 2021 年总统约韦内尔-莫伊兹的暗杀事件，其中包括他的遗孀、一名前总理和一名前警察局长。
item.description: A Haitian judge has indicted dozens of people over alleged involvement in the 2021 assassination of president Jovenel Moise, including his widow, a former prime minister and an ex-police chief, according to court documents seen by AFP u.afp.com/5NLA

item.title: R to @AFP：#英国亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）在其购买曼联少数股份的交易完成后表示，成为曼联的共同所有者是一种 "巨大的荣誉 "和 "责任"。
item.description: #UPDATE British billionaire Jim Ratcliffe said becoming a co-owner of Manchester United is a "great honour" and "responsibility" after his purchase of a minority stake was finalised u.afp.com/5NLQ
